text: Mulholland Drive is an American neo-noir mystery drama movie set in and around Los Angeles. David Lynch wrote and directed the movie. Lynch won the Best Director Award for it at the 2001 Cannes Film Festival. These actors who star in the movie include Naomi Watts, Laura Harring, Justin Theroux, Ann Miller and Robert Forster. == Other websites == * Mulholland Drive on IMDb Category:2001 drama movies Category:2001 LGBT movies Category:2000s mystery movies Category:American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American mystery movies Category:LGBT drama movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Mystery drama movies Category:Movies directed by David Lynch Category:American independent movies Category:English-language movies
title: Mulholland Drive (movie)
